definition: small tubular solitary freshwater hydrozoan polyp
details:
noun
- small tubular solitary freshwater hydrozoan polyp
- trouble that cannot be overcome by a single effort because of its many aspects or its persistent and pervasive quality
= example: trouble that cannot be overcome by a single effort because of its many aspects or its persistent and pervasive quality
- a mythological serpent that would regrow heads in the place of those that were removed
